channel.title: School Break games?
channel.description:
Hey i want to know what sort of games you guys have at break at your school?
Yeah sure i play "it" or more commonly known as "tag" and other random stuff at break... just to lighten the mood and forget that next lesson i have double biology...
Also a fun one that my school just found was if anybody farts you are allowed to punch them or beat them up untill they touch a door handle/knob (this is a very fun game but only rarely works because of the lack of people farting). I also dont fart unless im standing next to a door handle lol.
So any fun things you have?

item.title: School Break games?
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:9, topic:99608”]We play that circle game where if you put your index finger and thumb together in a circle and someone looks at it below waist height you get to punch them in the arm.

Another one we play is that if someone flinches because of someone else you hit them twice.

Apart from that not many games :(…

edit: There was this shit game some people used to play where if someone had say a drink or sweets etc… and said fish the first person to say fish fish got all or some of whatever it was you had. I never played because it just sucked dick but alot of people did lol.[/quote] 6 inches =p. Hurts a bit after a while tho.

Read full topic

I got another one.

Slaps!

Put your hands near eachother, out away from you and when its your turn hit the person (your meant to get there hands, sometimes i get there faces for the fun of seeing them tear up.)

fucking pussy tbh.

Play nuckles. Same thing except you bash them with ur fist.

We play where you both put your knuckles on a table and slide a coin and the first person to split all of the other persons knuckles wins.
[/quote]

Yeah I remember playing that. It hurts a hell of a lot more then getting hit by knuckles Pretty much all the skin on my knuckles were gone.[/quote]

yeah, haven’t played that game in a year or so. But iI remember it fucking killed when you used a 2 pound coin. Blood went everywhere.

Hmm, bag slaps came back like last semester, my friend has a million of them on camera lol.

The only spare time I have is at lunch time, but I go home for lunch usually.

item.title: School Break games?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

davidude36:

o btw what is hacky sack… i assume you are american… because ive heard the term “hacky sack” used on american tv shows… lol

its a hard game with a sack filled with beads and you kick it around and shit but cant drop it
it is actually called footbag and hacky sack is just the trademarked name that has become common (sorta like klinex for tissue)

en.wikipedia.org

Hacky sack

A footbag is the term for a small, round bag filled with dry grain (e.g. rice) or sand, which is kicked into the air as part of a competitive game or as a display of dexterity. "Hacky Sack" is the name of a brand of footbag popular in the 1970s (currently owned by Wham-O), which has since become a generic trademark. Footbag games are similar to earlier Asian shuttlecock sports such as jianzi. The most common game of footbag consists of two or more players standing in a circle and trying to keep ...

and i only get 5 mins cant even piss since classes are far apart

item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I think ‘Tag’ is a little extreme for something to pass time, but I do some stupid stuff in the 7 minute passing periods I have.

I mostly just go to my next class and work for the next 5 minutes on homework thats due.
Every once in a while somebody will have a hacky sack, and I’ll join in for a few rallies.
